___type.description: Identifies what aws machine type should be used (m3.medium, etc.).

___tags.description: List of AWS tags to associate with the node.

___enablePublicIPs.description: Overrides the vpc's subnet values. Do we allow for Auto-assigned Public IPs

___provider.description: Identifies who the provider is for configuration.

___storage.description: List of storage devices to attach to the node.

___opts.description: The options for the storage device provider.

___labels.description: List of Kubernetes labels to associate with the node.

$eref.description: Describes a Kubernetes node label. For more information on labels, see the [documentation](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/labels/).
$eref.title: Kubernetes Node Label

___subnet.description: Identifies what subnets should be used.  These are names of subnets created elsewhere in the configuration.
